attributes.action: Make 'Laughing Gas' NITROUS OXIDE a legal high  - ILLEGAL
attributes.additional_details: I know of one person dying from this....but there are many  children and young adults trying this....we need to stop this before anyone else loses a child
attributes.background: my 17 year old son was taken to hospital by his mates and he wasn't talking but was responsive,my sons face was paralysed and he couldn't speak and could only blink to communicate,.I managed to get him to communicate with pen and paper he had been taking legal highs these BALLOONS are dangerous
